text: A yi a fala Lewi bɔnsɔnna muxune xa, naxanye yi Isirayila birin naxaranma, naxanye yi rasariɲanxi Alatalaa wanla dɛxunni, a naxa, “Ɛ sa Layiri Kankiraan dɔxɔ Alatala Batu Banxini Isirayila Manga Dawudaa dii xɛmɛn Sulemani naxan tixi. Ɛ mi fa a maxalima ɛ tungunne ma iki. Nayi, ɛ wali Alatala ɛ Ala xa e nun Isirayila, a yamana.
